MGR:OldBow.NAME: Old Bow
MGR:OldBow.FLAVOR: Items are merely discarded. Items never die.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard or exhaust #b
cards, draw #b1 card.

MGR:BloodshotEyeball.NAME: Bloodshot Eyeball
MGR:BloodshotEyeball.FLAVOR: Only those who have not been gazed upon will gaze upon others urgently.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b
#ymgr:Gaze to all enemies. NL #ymgr:Gaze amount will not be less than #b1 .

MGR:Sunglasses.NAME: Sunglasses
MGR:Sunglasses.FLAVOR: However, is there really a need for sunglasses in the Spire?
DESCRIPTIONS: #ymgr:Gaze only reduces by #b
% when triggered.

MGR:UnknownCreature.FLAVOR: You don't know why it follows you, just as it doesn't know why you proceeds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, randomly #rEAT one of your #ynon-Boss relics, preferring high rarity.

MGR:Telescreen.NAME: Telescreen
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, enter #ymgr:Awaken .

MGR:LittleAngel.NAME: Little Angel
MGR:LittleAngel.FLAVOR: May you be freed from the shackles of misfortune.
DESCRIPTIONS: If the number of #ySkill cards drawn at the start of your turn is less than #b
, draw an additional #b
cards for #beach card less.

MGR:Fumo.NAME: Fumo
MGR:Fumo.FLAVOR: I WANT IT. I NEED IT.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b
#ymgr:Forte .

MGR:Maguroyaki.NAME: Maguro yaki
MGR:Maguroyaki.FLAVOR: A snack shaped like a Maguro. What could be the filling?
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #ySmith at Rest Sites, heal #b
% of your MAX HP .

MGR:MiniMicrophone.NAME: Mini Microphone
MGR:MiniMicrophone.FLAVOR: Let the singing voice resonate throughout the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, generate 1 #ymgr:AttackNote, #ymgr:DefendNote and #ymgr:DrawNote .

MGR:YourExclusiveStage.NAME: Your Exclusive Stage
MGR:YourExclusiveStage.FLAVOR: The reverberations of the voice traverse the entirety of the world.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #bMini #bMicrophone . NL Reduce the maximum of the #ymgr:Counter by #b1 . NL At the start of your turn, #ymgr:Improvise #b3 .

MGR:WitchHat.NAME: Witch Hat
MGR:WitchHat.FLAVOR: Lightweight, yet also useful in critical moments.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b2 block. NL If your HP is at or below #b50% , gain an additional #b2 block.

MGR:FriendsSpirit.NAME: Echo of Friend
MGR:FriendsSpirit.FLAVOR: Though a thousand miles apart in body, yet our hearts remain as close as a hand's span.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each combat, after you #yExhaust the first #rnon-Status, #rnon-Curse card, gain its #yTempClone.

MGR:Voracious.NAME: Voracious
MGR:Voracious.FLAVOR: The world is in constant flux, and abundance fills our plates.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStatus and #yCurse cards can now be played and exhausted. NL At the start of each combat, add #b1 random #yStatus and #yCurse card into your hand.
